channel.title: Need help with log in kill
channel.description: When I leave server running for a long period of time, every time anyone logs in, they are instantly hit 99 on and die. I believe it has somethign to do with jad and my pits, but not sure... I am using a delta 317. Any suggestion on where I can start trying to figure this out????

item.title: Need help with log in kill
item.dc:creator: @skate0ordie12345 skate0ordie12345
item.description:
@skate0ordie12345 wrote:

your screwed… everybody dies… game over man…

Read full topic

item.description:
@low93bowtie wrote:

ok is there a way to fix without having to restart server so frequently though. I have on an autorestarter right now which restarts ever 30 min and people are getting annoyed with it restarting all the time…

1st, Check client notepad
2nd, Check players notepad
3rd, Check NpcHandler notepad[/quote]

Idiot

@Restart your server.
